articles.author: Orla McCaffrey, Will Feuer
articles.title: Bank of America to Cut Overdraft Fees to $10 From $35 - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Regulators, politicians have been pressuring banks over fees; JPMorgan, Ally Financial have already announced changes
articles.content:
Bank of America Corp. said Tuesday it would cut overdraft fees to $10 from $35 beginning in May, following other big banks that have rolled back or ditched such charges.
Overdraft fees, which are ch… [+483 chars]

articles.title: Történelmi El Clásico a sivatag kellős közepén - Goal.com
articles.description: The Blues boss has been making use of an American forward’s versatility and sees benefits to Pulisic's ability to fill a number of different positions.

articles.author: STEPHEN LOIACONI, The National Desk
articles.title: Cloth masks offer limited protection as omicron spreads, experts warn - WRGB
articles.description: Public health experts are increasingly urging Americans to set aside the cloth masks many have become accustomed to wearing during the COVID-19 pandemic and strap on heavier, more protective medical-grade face coverings to slow the spread of the omicron varia…
